jobDescription: JOB PURPOSE: The Business Data Analyst III position will play a critical role in business analysis, and assisting business partners with their data source identification and analysis, data validation, and data preparation. Using data and analysis, will daily assist business in making decisions. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES: The duties of the Business Data Analyst include but are not limited to: Advanced skill set with ability to prepare, analyze, manipulate, and map business-centric data using SQL and other tools.Analytically measure business initiatives and present relevant findings.Derive and present business insights from large data sets, and communicate relevant findings and risks associated.Transforms client business questions into analytical and data answers, to include reports, analysis, and raw data.Serving as subject matter expert (SME) for business data in support of business initiatives.In conjunction with business analysts, financial analysts, and key stake holders within the business, work to obtain requirements and provide customer support for projects.Understands and interprets large scale data for multiple reporting purposes.Expert knowledge of related system applications and business processes across multiple domains.Mentor junior team members.JOB REQUIREMENTS:Bachelor's degree in technical field.Five years of hands-on experience working with data warehouses and data marts using SQL.Experience with analytic functions.Strong understanding of data warehouse and data mart concepts.Able to gather requirements, solution design, development, quality assurance, business support, and maintenance of data related projects.Able to maintain project documents and project code in an organized fashion.Strong written, verbal, and presentation communication skills.Able to work with statistical- and transactional-level data, and present and validate data to requirements.Experienced in taking initiative towards identifying and solving complex business problems.Excellent organizational, project, and time management skills with an attention for details.Must be self motivated, a self starter, and driven for achieving success within projects.#LI-ONE#LILH
